com.metreeca.tray.rdf

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.tray.rdf.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RDF4JMemory, RDF4JNative, RDF4JRemote, RDF4JSPARQL, Virtuoso

    public abstract class Graph
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Graph store.

    Manages task execution on an RDF repository.

    Nested task executions on the same graph store from the same thread will share the same connection to the backing RDF repository through a ThreadLocal context variable.

      • Factory

        public static final Supplier<Graph> Factory
        Graph factory.

        By default creates a graph backed by a RDF4J Memory store with no persistence.

    • Method Detail

      • repository

        protected abstract Repository repository()
        Retrieves the backing RDF repository.
        Returns:
        the backing RDF repository for this graph store; will be initializated and shut down as required by the calling code

      • isolation

        protected abstract IsolationLevel isolation()
        Retrieves the transaction isolation level.
        Returns:
        the isolation level for transactions on connection managed by this graph store

        public Graph query(Consumer<RepositoryConnection> task)
        Executes a task on this graph store.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to be executed; takes as argument a connection to the backing repository of this graph store
        Returns:
        this graph store
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if task is null

        Executes a task on this graph store.
        Type Parameters:

      • update

        public Graph update(Consumer<RepositoryConnection> task)
        Executes a task inside a transaction on this graph store.

        If a transaction is not already active on the shared repository connection, begins one at the isolation level required by this store and commits it on successful task completion; if the task throws an exception, the transaction is rolled back and the exception rethrown; in either case, no action is taken if the transaction was already terminated inside the task.

        Parameters:
        task - the task to be executed; takes as argument a connection to the backing repository of this graph store
        Returns:
        this graph store
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if task is null

      • update

        public <V> V update(Function<RepositoryConnection,V> task)
        Executes a task inside a transaction on this graph store.

        If a transaction is not already active on the shared repository connection, begins one at the isolation level required by this store and commits it on successful task completion; if the task throws an exception, the transaction is rolled back and the exception rethrown; in either case no action is taken if the transaction was already closed inside the task.

        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of the value returned by task
        Parameters:
        task - the task to be executed; takes as argument a connection to the backing repository of this graph store
        Returns:
        the value returned by task
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if task is null or returns a null value
